Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I wanted to get away from her, but she kept coming after me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'And it made her affected by Tenebrion as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Thankfully, her condition seems to have stabilized. I'll go see her when I have the time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Too sidetracked, I'll continue on with the actual report.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'After that, I went deeper into the ruins.', 4: '1'}
